welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Eagle, where the majestic Rocky Mountains meet small-town charm. Get ready to experience our stunning views, outdoor adventures, and friendly community. Enjoy your stay and make the most of all that Eagle has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boise Air Terminal/Gowen Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Boise Air Terminal/Gowen Field Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Boise Air Terminal/Gowen Field Airport serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the network "BOI Free WiFi" and agreeing to the terms and conditions.
